SEARCH
Package org.jarzarr.ui

Class UIScene<A extends Enum<A>>

java.lang.Object
org.jarzarr.ui.UIScene<A>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Scene
public abstract class UIScene<A extends Enum<A>> extends Object implements Scene
Scene implementation that owns a UI tree and renders it in screen space.

UIScene is an overlay scene by default so the UI can be drawn over gameplay.

This scene:

  • Maintains a UIRoot as the UI tree root
  • Maintains a UIContext that wraps input/assets and frame state
  • Runs UI layout, input routing, update, and render

    • onResize

      public void onResize(int width, int height)
      Updates the UI root size on window resize. Layout will be recomputed on the next update tick (or immediately if update runs right after).
      Specified by:
      onResize in interface Scene
      Parameters:
      width - new canvas width
      height - new canvas height

      • update UI tree
